name: Stamplay LTD.
description: Developer of a cloud-based application programming interface platform designed to automate business operation. The company's platform facilitates digitize operation by creating workflows that map to real business processes and eliminate the lag between getting information from one department to the next, enabling developers from different sectors like, consumer support, sales, operation, marketing, human resource and finance to create web applications without writing back-end codes and eliminate manual work.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based application programming interface platform designed to automate business operation. The company's platform facilitates digitize operation by creating workflows that map to real business processes and eliminate the lag between getting information from one department to the next, enabling developers from different sectors like, consumer support, sales, operation, marketing, human resource and finance to create web applications without writing back-end codes and eliminate manual work.
